root.name: Johnny Bravo: The Hukka-Mega-Mighty-Ultra-Extreme Date-O-Rama!
root.description: Info: Johnny Bravo: The Hukka-Mega-Mighty-Ultra-Extreme Date-O-Rama has the same look and feel as the Johnny Bravo TV series, and the simple yet fun design makes it instantly accessible to casual and non-hardcore gamers. Use the NDS stylus to try and beat your opponent in the Muscle Madness weight lifting event and have fun throwing rubbish in the recycling bins or straight at your opponents in Taking Out the Trash. Use the Cheese-O-Vac suction gun to vacuum up the plague of mice, then blow into the NDS microphone to clear the collected rodents ready for the next Cheese-O-Vac vendetta! Control the food catapult using NDS Touch Screen Technology - try to impress the chick by firing all the food at your rival!
